com.lows
Interface LoWSReducedType

All Known Implementing Classes:
BEPSLoWSReducedType, PSALoWSReducedType
public interface LoWSReducedType

This is the interface class for all reduced LoWS types. All new reduced LoWS types must implement this interface. See the BEPSLoWSReducedType class as an example how this is done.

Author:
Sven Zehl

Method Summary
 java.lang.String decodeData(java.lang.String dataInHex)
          This function takes the payload of the LoWS message and decodes it.
 java.lang.String getAlarmClickStandardText(java.lang.String serviceData)
          This function takes the raw payload of the LoWS message and returns the text that should be displayed within the AlarmClickActivity Currently this is used to decode the lic in a advanced manner, see the BEPSLoWSReducedType as an example implementation
 boolean getAlarmStartState()
          If the Alarm switch should be displayed, should it initially turned off or on? Return true if initially enabled, false if initially disabled
 java.lang.String getDisplayString()
          This function should return the String that is displayed within the Scan Result ListView if this specific service with the specific type number was found.
 java.lang.String getIconName()
          Get the name of the icon which should be displayed together with the Display String
 java.lang.String getSearchFieldDescription()
          If the Search field should be displayed what should be listed above the search field.
 int getTypeNumber()
          This function should return the LoWS type number that identifies this specific LoWS type
 boolean showAlarmSwitch()
          Should the alarm switch be displayed in the ClickActivity? If yes, return true.
 boolean showSearchFieldSwitch()
          Should the Search Field be displayed within the ClickActivity? If yes return true.

int getTypeNumber()
This function should return the LoWS type number that identifies this specific LoWS type

Returns:

getDisplayString

java.lang.String getDisplayString()
This function should return the String that is displayed within the Scan Result ListView if this specific service with the specific type number was found.

Returns:

decodeData

java.lang.String decodeData(java.lang.String dataInHex)
This function takes the payload of the LoWS message and decodes it. It returns the decoded LoWS data that can afterwards be displayed to the user. Currently for the reduced type this function is used to decode the lic part.

Parameters:
dataInHex, - raw LoWS message paylod (lic) in hex as String

getIconName

java.lang.String getIconName()
Get the name of the icon which should be displayed together with the Display String

showAlarmSwitch

boolean showAlarmSwitch()
Should the alarm switch be displayed in the ClickActivity? If yes, return true.

Returns:

showSearchFieldSwitch

boolean showSearchFieldSwitch()
Should the Search Field be displayed within the ClickActivity? If yes return true.

Returns:

getSearchFieldDescription

java.lang.String getSearchFieldDescription()
If the Search field should be displayed what should be listed above the search field.

Returns:

getAlarmStartState

boolean getAlarmStartState()
If the Alarm switch should be displayed, should it initially turned off or on? Return true if initially enabled, false if initially disabled

Returns:

getAlarmClickStandardText

java.lang.String getAlarmClickStandardText(java.lang.String serviceData)
